description.value:
If used as a weapon deals 1d10 Energy Damage per kilo used, with a blast radius of 2 metres per kilogram used. Those caught in area must make agility test or be set on fire.

Requirements

Found often in gas giants, an oily green fluid that bursts into dark blue flames when exposed to oxygen.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
